mapper.insert: insert into article_information (serial_number, orderN, title, author,typeN,cover, describeN,creation_time,creation_people, state,specific_content,imgs) values (#{serialNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describeN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now(), #{creationPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specificContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{imgs,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})

insert into article_information
serial_number,
orderN,
title,
author,
typeN,
cover,
describeN,
creation_time,
creation_people,
state,
specific_content,
imgs,

mapper.update:
update article_information
orderN = #{orderN,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
typeN = #{typeN,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
describeN = #{describeN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creation_people = #{creationPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
specific_content = #{specificContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
imgs = #{imgs,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update article_information set orderN = #{orderN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeN = #{typeN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describeN = #{describeN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creation_people = #{creationPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, specific_content = #{specificContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, imgs = #{imgs,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update article_information set orderN = #{orderN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeN = #{typeN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describeN = #{describeN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creation_people = #{creationPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, specific_content = #{specificContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, imgs = #{imgs,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
,
from article_information where 1=1
AND title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND typeN = #{typeN,jdbcType=INTEGER}
